attributes.action: Banking Fraudsters, Dodgy Politicians & Corporate Tax Dodgers Should Be Held Accountable
attributes.additional_details: Any Banker who was involved in creating the huge financial mess were in, just as an example, those responsible for emptying the pension pots. Politicians who knowingly ripped tax payers off with their greedy expenses. Corporate bosses of companies who employ devious tatics to resist huge tax amounts outstanding. All these issues should be properly addressed and the gulity held acountable. Then this country can begin again and start the healing.
